alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Lonoke; Pulaski (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 4:54PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lonoke, southeastern Faulkner and northeastern Pulaski Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Sylvan Hills, or over Sherwood, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... Jacksonville... Cabot... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Ward... Austin in Lonoke County... Argenta... Old Austin... Parnell... Gravel Ridge... Estes... Meto... Toltec Mounds State Park... Olmstead... Protho Junction... Lakewood... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
